attributes.title: 0/10- would NOT recommend
attributes.review: After downloading this app, I found that I could no longer access any other apps on my home screen. My phone, as well as all of the electronics in my house, were fried from the toxic gamma radiation emitted from this app. With no form of communication, my family had to go and purchase new TVs, computers, phones, etc, which was really inconvenient. But it’s all good because we held a seance and used voodoo magic on a Trump doll. Hope my needle didn’t cause permanent damage, because my doll was a wreck.

attributes.title: Do not download this app
attributes.review: I downloaded 🔄 this app hoping to support 🤝 the one true American 🇺🇸 hero president Trump 🦅, but when when I opened the app 📲 I was shocked 😨. I thought I would be able to see 👀 when his next events 📆 were, but instead my phone was flooded 🌊 with images of a man getting a spray tan naked 🚫👔 with what appeared to be a very tiny👌🏻 cocktail weenie 🌭 below the waist. Now I know that could not 🙅🏻‍♀️ be my president 🦅 , he has a YUGE 🙌🏻 cocktail weenie. I don’t know that American 🇺🇸 hating snowflake ❄️ is behind this, but I want to talk to the manager 😡

attributes.title: VERY DANGEROUS APP!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i didn’t know how to see since i’m deaf and the most craziest thing happened 😱! a crazy man with a toy plastic knife started chasing me down the atlantic ocean and shot me 69,420 times 😢! as i tried to moan for help trump came and tied me up to a mouse and made me watch him and his daughter to very disturbing things 😶😖! they were doing straight tik tok dances 🔪💔! i finally i tied myself though and escaped! after my crazy experience i went home and blew out my goldfish’s back and ate macaroni which is what good 😼 sounds like✨.

attributes.title: THE WORST APP!
attributes.review: This app will do anything up to stealing your social security! I had gone into the app and the app had told me to put in my social security number. I got very confused as in why. So, I decided to immediately delete the app because it could have also been stealing my IP Address. This app is very weird and strange. Please do not download and also let me say. This app also gives pornographic images of children! My eyes are hurting now and I can’t unsee it! Please delete this app and take it off because it’s strange and weird.

attributes.title: Total waste of my data
attributes.review: I had high expectations for this app. I’m a full supporter of our racist, selfish, women hating, tactless president. He’s just the greatest thing to ever happen to this country ya know? Anyways, as soon as I opened the app, my phone crashed! Keeps freezing up randomly and my battery is trash now! Really thought the trump administration would make this app great. Guess I was wrong🤷🏼‍♀️ it’s a shame really. How am I supposed to get updates on that Cheeto man’s campaign? Guess I’ll just have to reserve tickets for more rallies🤷🏼‍♀️😉 #savetiktok

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!
attributes.review: First of all, there are many bugs within the app that need to be checked into. They’re almost as bad as peaches 🐱. Secondly, this app has been using my information, such as my name and phone number, which is being sent to telemarketers and scammers. I did some research on this app and apparently it installs another tracker on your phone. Don’t believe me? Well this ant has been following me for days and I know it’s because of this app. ITS NOT FAKE NEWS!!! i’m serious do not get this app or else your ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ will be stolen!

attributes.title: The 🍤little🍤 things
attributes.review:
This app is TRASH!! how do u expect him to make America great when he can’t even hold his water right❤️ he worry’s more about his tan then he does his people.🤦‍♀️ I am curious as to how he has HELLLA money but can’t afford a decent wig🤭this man also got PRANKED by kid 😂 says a lot about your president #saveTiktok
overall the app isn’t worth wasting your storage #savebarron2020 
And for all the ✨RaCiSt✨ reading this just remember your ancestors where once illegal too 🤯 I know right crazy. So give the natives the respect they deserve and much more 😘🥰

attributes.title: Disgosting Luv😍
attributes.review: This app is honestly atrocious. When I opened it the first thing I saw was Mr. Donald Orange Trump🙄. My eyes started to water and I couldn’t see. I had to go to the hospital to get them fixed😪. That wasted so much extra time I could’ve spent sleeping. And not to mention the app itself is disgusting. The graphics are horrible, everything is bland(just like trumps lil nasty followers), and they want your info. Like no Donald I don’t want to be one of your next victims🙄🤚. Anyways horrible waste of my time. I would give it 0 stars if I had to.

attributes.title: This app was horrible ✨disappointment✨
attributes.review: I wanted trump 2020 but I realized how it didn’t work I knew✨✨ oboma was the best president ✨✨and id Advise you take this app down this app made so sooooo mad !!! I hope y’all know how much pain you have brought!! My fellow Cheeto was the best one but then my goldfish died and I knew it was the app because they are watching me and as a 56 year old woman I shouldn’t have to worry about my goldfish(now tell the rat to pull up) ✨✨anonymous2020✨✨ sending hate to bunker boi! MY GOLD FISHHHHHHH I REALLY MISS GOLDEN CHEESE BUT THEY SAW ME AND KILLED HERR DIE IN A HOLE!!!!!” rip Golden cheese, may you swim in peace “

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: They found out where I live and they broke in and stole my guinea pigs and gave them to snakes and made me watch. And then they slap me on the wrist so many times till my wrist turned black so I could understand what the term Black Lives Matter means. They told me that all lives matter and that I need to shut up or else they’re going to kill my cats they took my mom and my dad I don’t know where they are this is so scary they will find all your information and make your life horrible do not get the app!!!!
